data.title: In light of recent shooting, Canadian news network refuses to use shooter's name; "We will not help give this killer his blaze of glory."
Stephen Fry denounces UK government for not acting on Snowden revelations
U.S. admits supplying lethal aid to Syrian rebels
Vietnam has released dramatic footage showing a large Chinese ship chasing and ramming one of its fishing boats that then sank near an oil rig in contested waters in the South China Sea
North Korea detains U.S. citizen; now has three in custody
'I'm not going to Brazil' hashtag tackles World Cup
Man who spotted what may have been the burning missing Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 off the coast of Vietnam sacked from his position on an oil rig after reporting the incident.
Putin says Russian city Volgograd can become Stalingrad again
An American fossils dealer has been jailed for smuggling dinosaur bones including a 70-million-year-old Tyrannosaurus fossil from Mongolia.
